net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy
Class StimuliResponseStrategy

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.jabm.strategy.AbstractStrategy
      net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy.AbstractTradingStrategy
          net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy.FixedQuantityStrategyImpl

                      net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy.DiscreteLearnerStrategy
                          net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy.StimuliResponseStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, net.sourceforge.jabm.event.EventListener, net.sourceforge.jabm.strategy.Strategy, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Prototypeable, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Resetable, AdaptiveStrategy, FixedQuantityStrategy, TradingStrategy, MarketEventListener
public class StimuliResponseStrategy
extends DiscreteLearnerStrategy
implements java.io.Serializable

A trading strategy that uses a stimuli-response learning algorithm, such as the Roth-Erev algorithm, to adapt its trading behaviour in successive market rounds by using the agent's profits in the last round as a reward signal.

See Also:
Serialized Form
